                   Deep Blue Sea.1999.DVDRip.x264.AC3[5.1]-VGL



Movie Title: Deep Blue Sea

Director: Renny Harlin

Cast: Thomas Jane, Saffron Burrows, Samuel L. Jackson, LL Cool J




This is a DVDRip of the film in MKV format (Matroska container). You will need VLC Player to view the movie.

For even better results, and in order to enable H.264 playback in Windows Media Player the following software is suggested:

CoreAVC
Haali Media Splitter
AC3 Filter
VobSub & VSFilter (For the Subtitles)

Recommended Codec Pack: CCCP - Combined Community Codec Pack




Language: English

Optional Subtitles [Included in the Matroska Container]:
English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Greek, Swedish, Danish

Instructions using the subtitle streams

----------------------------------------------------
Viewing the subtitles with VLC Player:
----------------------------------------------------

Video-->Subtitles Track-->Select

Subtitle Screenshot for VLC Player: <a href="
http://www.lookpic.com/files/1421.JPG" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.lookpic.com/files/1421.JPG</a>

--------------------------------------------------------------
Viewing the subtitles with Haali Media Splitter
--------------------------------------------------------------

Right click on Haali tray icon-->Select subtitles

**NOTE**
VobSub & VSFilter must be installed

Subtitle Screenshot for Haali Media Splitter: <a href="
http://www.lookpic.com/files/2346.JPG" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
